local_intent: Perceive white_plate, compute top grasp, approach, pick, and verify grasp stability
assumptions: white_plate is visible within camera view
gripper is open and ready (as per global tree prior steps)
compute-grasp produces a usable grasp stored under white_plate_grasp
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT 'grasp' phase: detect the white plate, compute a top grasp, approach and align, execute Pick using the computed grasp, and verify IsGraspStable as in the global plan.
